fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Single market, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: Banking Directives and regulations, AML, GDPR, EBA guidelines, Mifid II etc. Participating in the association of Cyprus Banks to promote several banking issues.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Banking institution aiming to provide benefit for the shareholders and also help the business community of Cyprus by providing services and financing.
